Name: Share Prospective Students (Not Currently ILLINOIS) on Facebook

Name: Share Intercollegiate Transfer (ICT) on Facebook
Research Interest: The  Intercollegiate Transfer (ICT)  process is for undergraduate students who are currently enrolled in an academic program at ILLINOIS and wish to transfer into the iSchool. This page includes information for students interested in a  Dual-Degree.

Name: Share New Student Orientation on Facebook
Research Interest: Events and activities for new iSchool undergraduate students.

Name: Share iSchool on Facebook
Research Interest: The  iSchool at Illinois  leads the way in shaping the future of information. This success is the result of a commitment to research, education, and engagement and a long historyof innovation. Our School consistently earns recognition as one of the best destinations—both on campus and online—for professional studies in the information sciences.

Research Interest: Click on this post  to view the BS/IS Degree Requirements.

Name: Share Courses on Facebook
Research Interest: Information Sciences offers a variety of courses to equip students to be leaders in a knowledge society and innovators in a knowledge economy, providing an interdisciplinary education focused on the fundamentals of information sciences.
